pullRequest.title: fill out missing test coverage for druid-stats, druid-momentsketch, druid-tdigestsketch postaggs
pullRequest.bodyText: Like #9730 but for the druid-stats, druid-momentsketch, and druid-tdigestsketch extensions, also a few minor bug fixes like null handling for some stats postaggs, and comparators for moments min/max post aggs and tdigest quantile post agg.

commit.message: postagg test coverage for druid-stats, druid-momentsketch, druid-tdigestsketch and fixes

nodes.bodyText: Seems like the comparator should compare doubles instead of throwing an exception.
